name: LaunchPad Lab
tagline: We Build Apps That Grow Businesses
description: LaunchPad Lab is a web development firm. We build and grow businesses through web and mobile. Our clients include startups, non profits and Fortune 500 companies. We focus on using our technology expertise to help our clients exceed their business goals. To do that, we design and build innovative solutions with close attention to user experience. Let us help you build and grow your business!
